name: U_235
description:
As a heavy isotope 🧪, don't blink if you want to dodge the neutrons.

Controls (intended to be one-handed 🤟):

  • Move: UP, DOWN, LEFT and RIGHT ARROWS
  • Restabilize: SPACE BAR

The closer the neutrons get to you, the higher your score. Too close, and it will hit you🎇. After taking some risks, your charge increases 📈 and you can release it with the SPACE BAR to restabilize ✅.

Be aware that some particles are negatively 😈 or positively 😇 charged and so are you.

Credits ❤
  • 🎵 Music by Deadwingtree
  • 🔊 Sounds (freesound.org)
    • Electric movement: tosha73
    • Radiation meter: cookies policy
    • Electric flyby: Glaneur de sons
    • Electric buzz: Halleck
    • Laser pulse: sharesynth
